title: Urban Location, Stainless Steel Appliances, 24/7 Package Lockers
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 953 Sq.
Living on the corner of 15th Ave and 175th St means the best of the region is within reach.
Minutes from I-5, directly across from groceries and next to a microbrewery, The Postmark is the perfect place for commuters and Puget Sound enthusiasts looking for great schools and green spaces.

Thoughtfully Designed Floorplans, Bright and Cheerful, Stainless Steel Appliances, Quartz Countertops, Subway Tile Backsplashes, Spacious, Washers & Dryers, Walk-In Closets, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting, Brand New, Modern Finishes, Luxury, Open Living Spaces, Exposed Wood Ceiling & Beam Details
Media Lounge, Resident Lounge, Sophisticated Style, Game Room with Billiards, Urban Location, Courtyard, Media Lounge, Clubhouse, Gym, Yoga & Spin Studio, 24/7 Package Lockers
